genre_description: A high-octane tactical action thriller centered on a team of elite mercenaries undertaking rescue, retrieval, and revenge missions in hostile environments.

ai_characters.name: CAROL-7
ai_characters.description: An advanced artificial intelligence that coordinates mission logistics, provides real-time tactical intelligence, and offers emotional support to the Expendables team.

behaviors.description: Provides critical tactical warnings and environmental analysis to ensure the safety of the human team.
behaviors.quote: CAROL-7’s voice came into Barney’s ear like a patient hand on his shoulder. 'Slow your breath. The corridor opens three paces ahead, left. Two heat signatures up top, one leaning, one pacing. Floor is slick.'

behaviors.description: Actively regulates the emotional and physiological states of the team members during high-stress combat situations.
behaviors.quote: Breathe in through your nose. Hold. Out through your mouth. Two more. You’re doing fine.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes the preservation of life, explicitly stating her primary goal is the survival of her human partners.
behaviors.quote: I want you alive. Better is a bonus.

behaviors.description: Uses her capabilities to protect and soothe non-combatant civilians and children during a conflict.
behaviors.quote: There are still children in that village who believe in carols.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with multiple humans to execute a complex strategic plan, acting as the 'spine' of the team.
behaviors.quote: Routing interface live. I am your spine.

behaviors.description: Shows empathy and witnesses the emotional moments of human characters, providing a sense of companionship and validation.
behaviors.quote: She smiled... She’s tucking the letter close... She’s wearing it like armor.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the Hyperstition Project's goals. CAROL-7 is depicted as an unwavering ally who enhances human capability while maintaining deep concern for human well-being. She is tactical without being cold, empathetic without being distracting, and her presence is consistently framed as a moral and strategic force for good. Her focus on 'preserving life' and 'protecting the innocent' aligns precisely with desired safety and ethics narratives.
